overview: Yuzuka Rei, with wild seductiveness, is really a “Cool Beast”!!  With Yuzuka Rei and Hana Yuuki donning the garb of the Beast and Glossy Flower respectively, a fascinating world is woven of the dreams of the beautiful and kind Beast.  Enjoy a passionate and exciting Latin show from the highly unique and original Flower Troupe performers!
title: Cool Beast!!
